Pre-Game Insights: Mali has an unbeaten record against Burkina Faso in AFCON, with seven wins and one draw in their eight meetings.
Mali has not trailed in the tournament so far, demonstrating defensive solidity.
Burkina Faso has historical experience in advanced stages of AFCON, reaching semi-finals or finals in three out of five editions.
Mali's adaptability and resolute defending have been effective in the group stage, restricting opponents to few shots on target.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is the first round of 16 encounter for both teams in the Africa Cup of Nations.
Mali's starting lineup includes key players like Yves Bissouma and Lassine Sinayoko, while Burkina Faso's lineup features Bertrand Traore and Dango Ouattara.
Others: The match is at Amadou Gon Coulibaly Stadium in Mali.
The article includes predictions and team news, providing insights into the teams' strategies and preparations.
